headline: How Southern's New Microgrid Push in New Mexico (SO) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: PowerSecure, a Southern Company subsidiary, previously announced a collaboration with Kit Carson Electric Cooperative to build three microgrids with 7.5 MW of battery storage in Northern New Mexico, aimed at improving grid resilience and maintaining critical power during events such as wildfires and severe weather. This focus on microgrids and battery systems highlights Southern’s operational push into distributed energy solutions that can bolster reliability for critical infrastructure...

headline: Georgia Power delivers lower costs for customers with latest filings
summary: Georgia Power today filed its expected Fuel Cost Recovery (Docket 56765) and Storm Cost Recovery (Docket 44280) cases with the Georgia Public Service Commission (PSC). Together, the cases seek to lower costs for customers through two distinct filings. The first filing requests to recover the cost of fuel – including coal and natural gas – to operate power generation plants to serve customers, and the second filing requests to recover costs to quickly and safely restore electric service following

headline: Southern Microgrid Push Highlights Resilience Projects And Valuation Debate
summary: PowerSecure, a subsidiary of Southern Company (NYSE:SO), is collaborating with Kit Carson Electric Cooperative to build community microgrids and battery energy storage systems in Northern New Mexico. The project is aimed at improving grid resilience and energy reliability for communities exposed to wildfires and extreme weather risks. The initiative focuses on local energy resources and backup power solutions designed to keep critical services running during grid disruptions. For investors...

headline: Southern Michigan Bancorp, Inc. Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Earnings
summary: SMBT Jackson Summit Township Branch Southern Michigan Bank and Trust, Jackson Summit Township Branch COLDWATER, Mich., Feb. 17, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Southern Michigan Bancorp, Inc. (OTC Pink: SOMC) announced fourth quarter 2025 net income of $2,912,000, or $0.62 per share, an increase of $262,000, or 9.9%, compared to net income of $2,650,000, or $0.57 per share, for the fourth quarter of 2024. Southern earned $12,215,000, or $2.63 per share, for the year ended December 31, 2025, an increase

headline: Assessing Southern (SO) Valuation After Analyst Upgrades And New PowerSecure Microgrid Collaboration
summary: Southern (SO) is back in focus after fresh analyst commentary on earnings expectations and a new PowerSecure microgrid collaboration that together highlight how the utility is approaching growth, resilience and investor sentiment. See our latest analysis for Southern. That recent PowerSecure microgrid news and shifting earnings commentary come as Southern’s share price sits at US$94.95, with a 30 day share price return of 6.8% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 14.7%.
